title: fix修理权限
author: 煜爱芸
txt_content:
fix 、 fix hand 的权限是什么 essentials.fix没用呃!!
求好心人解答~

replies.author: yoga9105
replies.txt_content:
/fix和/repair是同一个指令,需要这四个权限
essentials.repair
essentials.repair.all
essentials.repair.armor
essentials.repair.enchanted

replies.author: 煜爱芸
replies.txt_content:
yoga9105 发表于 2015-10-2 17:34
/fix和/repair是同一个指令,需要这四个权限
essentials.repair
essentials.repair.all
谢谢啊!!!
